code: import React,{useState}from'react';import WelcomeView from'./components/WelcomeView';import HomeView from'./components/HomeView';import TextView from'./components/TextView';import showIcon from'./assets/images/show.svg';import closeIcon from'./assets/images/Closed.svg';import MobileView from'./components/MobileView';import HistoryList from'./components/HistoryList';import VoiceChat from'./components/VoiceChat';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const App=()=>{const[currentView,setCurrentView]=useState('welcome');const[messages,setMessages]=useState([]);const[inputText,setInputText]=useState('');const[isOpen,setIsOpen]=useState(false);const handleSendMessage=()=>{setMessages([...messages,{sender:'user',text:inputText}]);setInputText('');};const toggleMobileView=()=>{setIsOpen(!isOpen);setCurrentView('welcome');};const renderCurrentView=()=>{switch(currentView){case'welcome':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(WelcomeView,{setCurrentView:setCurrentView});case'home':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HomeView,{setCurrentView:setCurrentView});case'voice':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(VoiceChat,{setCurrentView:setCurrentView});case'text':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextView,{messages:messages,inputText:inputText,setInputText:setInputText,handleSendMessage:handleSendMessage,setCurrentView:setCurrentView});case'history_list':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HistoryList,{setCurrentView:setCurrentView});default:return null;}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-white",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:toggleMobileView,className:"fixed bottom-4 right-4 z-50",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:!isOpen?closeIcon:showIcon,alt:"toggle-widget",className:"w-12 h-12"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MobileView,{isOpen:isOpen,children:renderCurrentView()})]});};export default App;
